name: unitgrpbas
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

stmt.origin: ax-mp(wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c1)), wss(c0, cfv(cbs, c2)))

body.origin:
|- wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c1))
-| wss(c0, cfv(cbs, c2))
-| wi(wss(c0, cfv(cbs, c2)), wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c1)))
body.pretty:
⊢ c0 =(Base ` c1)
⊣ c0 ⊆(Base ` c2)
⊣ (c0 ⊆(Base ` c2)→ c0 =(Base ` c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c1))
-| wss(c0, cfv(cbs, c2))
-| wi(wss(c0, cfv(cbs, c2)), wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c1)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ c0 =(Base ` c1)
⊣ c0 ⊆(Base ` c2)
⊣ (c0 ⊆(Base ` c2)→ c0 =(Base ` c1))

body.origin:
|- wss(c0, cfv(cbs, c2))
-| wceq(cfv(cbs, c2), cfv(cbs, c2))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cui, c2))
body.pretty:
⊢ c0 ⊆(Base ` c2)
⊣ (Base ` c2)=(Base ` c2)
⊣ c0 =(Unit ` c2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c1))
-| wi(wss(c0, cfv(cbs, c2)), wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c1)))
-| wceq(cfv(cbs, c2), cfv(cbs, c2))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cui, c2))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ c0 =(Base ` c1)
⊣ (c0 ⊆(Base ` c2)→ c0 =(Base ` c1))
⊣ (Base ` c2)=(Base ` c2)
⊣ c0 =(Unit ` c2)

stmt.origin: ressbas2(c0, cfv(cbs, c2), c1, cfv(cmgp, c2))

body.origin:
|- wi(wss(c0, cfv(cbs, c2)), wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c1)))
-| wceq(c1, co(cfv(cmgp, c2), cress, c0))
-| wceq(cfv(cbs, c2), cfv(cbs, cfv(cmgp, c2)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ⊆(Base ` c2)→ c0 =(Base ` c1))
⊣ c1 =((mulGrp ` c2)[|`s]c0)
⊣ (Base ` c2)=(Base `(mulGrp ` c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c1))
-| wceq(cfv(cbs, c2), cfv(cbs, c2))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cui, c2))
-| wceq(c1, co(cfv(cmgp, c2), cress, c0))
-| wceq(cfv(cbs, c2), cfv(cbs, cfv(cmgp, c2)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ c0 =(Base ` c1)
⊣ (Base ` c2)=(Base ` c2)
⊣ c0 =(Unit ` c2)
⊣ c1 =((mulGrp ` c2)[|`s]c0)
⊣ (Base ` c2)=(Base `(mulGrp ` c2))

body.origin:
|- wceq(cfv(cbs, c2), cfv(cbs, cfv(cmgp, c2)))
-| wceq(cfv(cmgp, c2), cfv(cmgp, c2))
-| wceq(cfv(cbs, c2), cfv(cbs, c2))
body.pretty:
⊢ (Base ` c2)=(Base `(mulGrp ` c2))
⊣ (mulGrp ` c2)=(mulGrp ` c2)
⊣ (Base ` c2)=(Base ` c2)

⊣ c0 =(Unit ` c2)

cumulated.origin:

comment: The base set of the group of units. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Dec-2014.)
